original_content:
About the Role

We are looking for a Senior Visual Designer with a strong background in mobile and web application design to lead visual design efforts for our digital platforms. This role requires expertise in high-fidelity UI design, micro-interactions, and motion design, ensuring visually stunning and user-friendly experiences. The ideal candidate should be comfortable collaborating with cross-functional teams, including UX designers, developers, and product managers, to deliver seamless digital experiences.

This role also requires expertise in micro-interactions, animations, and engaging UI elements that enhance user engagement and interaction.


Key Responsibilities

Â· Design High-Fidelity UI & Visual Elements â€“ Create stunning, pixel-perfect designs for mobile and web applications, emphasizing usability and aesthetics.

Â· Implement Micro-Interactions & Animations â€“ Design and prototype Lottie animations, After Effects animations, and SVG-based interactions to elevate the user experience.

Â· Develop Motion Guidelines & UI Behaviors â€“ Establish principles for motion, real-time interactions, UI transitions, and immersive visual storytelling.

Â· Collaborate on a Scalable Design System: Collaborate with Design System experts to define UI components, typography, color schemes, iconography, and visual hierarchy, ensuring consistency and compliance with WCAG 2.2 and W3C accessibility standards.

Â· Prototype Interactive Elements â€“ Utilize Figma, Adobe After Effects, Lottie Files, or ProtoPie to create interactive prototypes that communicate design intent effectively.

Â· Collaborate with UX & Development Teams â€“ Work closely with UX designers to enhance user journeys and engineers to optimize animations for performance.

Â· Data-Driven Visual Enhancements â€“ Leverage user insights, A/B testing, and analytics to refine visual elements and micro-interactions for better engagement.

Â· Ensure Brand Consistency Across Platforms â€“ Align visual identity with brand guidelines and user expectations for a cohesive digital experience across mobile and web platforms.

Required Skills & Experience

Â· 7+ years of experience in UI/Visual Design for mobile and web applications.

Â· Expertise in high-fidelity UI design, typography, layout, and visual hierarchy.

Â· Mastery of Figma, and Photoshop, with a strong ability to create designs aligned with design system guidelines.

Â· Strong experience in designing micro-interactions, UI animations, and motion graphics using LottieFiles, After Effects, and ProtoPie.

Â· Deep understanding of mobile design guidelines for Android (Material Design) and iOS (Human Interface Guidelines), along with responsive web design principles.

Â· Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and SVG animations for effective collaboration with developers.

Â· Experience creating interactive prototypes that enhance UX flows.

Â· Experience working in Agile/Scrum environments using tools like JIRA, Confluence.

Â· Strong ability to communicate user flows and task flows, transitioning from low fidelity to high-fidelity designs while ensuring feasibility checks and implementation.

Â· A strong portfolio showcasing UI design, motion design, and interactive prototypes.


Preferred Qualifications

Â· Knowledge of accessibility design standards and UI performance optimization.

Â· Strong storytelling and visual narrative skills to guide user interactions effectively.

Â· Ability to push the boundaries of UI animation while maintaining performance and usability.

Â· Familiarity with Axure, ProtoPie or comparable mobile animation tools

Role Overview:
This role is crucial in leading the visual design efforts for our digital platforms, including mobile and web applications. As a Senior Visual Designer, you will be responsible for creating stunning, user-friendly, and visually engaging experiences that captivate our customers. Your expertise in high-fidelity UI design, micro-interactions, and motion design will be instrumental in elevating the overall user experience. Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, you will ensure that our digital offerings are not only aesthetically pleasing but also highly functional and accessible.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design high-fidelity UI and visual elements for mobile and web applications, emphasizing usability and aesthetics
- Implement engaging micro-interactions, animations, and UI behaviors to enhance user engagement and interaction
- Develop motion design guidelines and principles for UI transitions, real-time interactions, and immersive visual storytelling
- Collaborate with Design System experts to define and maintain UI components, typography, color schemes, iconography, and visual hierarchy, ensuring consistency and compliance with accessibility standards
- Create interactive prototypes using tools like Figma, Adobe After Effects, Lottie Files, and ProtoPie to effectively communicate design intent
- Work closely with UX designers and engineers to optimize animations and micro-interactions for performance
- Leverage user insights, A/B testing, and analytics to refine visual elements and micro-interactions for better engagement
- Ensure brand consistency across all digital platforms, aligning with brand guidelines and user expectations

Required Skills:
- 7+ years of experience in UI/Visual Design for mobile and web applications
- Expertise in high-fidelity UI design, typography, layout, and visual hierarchy
- Mastery of design tools like Figma and Photoshop, with a strong ability to create designs aligned with design system guidelines
- Extensive experience in designing micro-interactions, UI animations, and motion graphics using LottieFiles, After Effects, and ProtoPie
- Deep understanding of mobile design guidelines for Android (Material Design) and iOS (Human Interface Guidelines), as well as responsive web design principles
- Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and SVG animations to effectively collaborate with developers
- Proven experience in creating interactive prototypes that enhance UX flows
- Proficiency in working in Agile/Scrum environments using tools like JIRA and Confluence
- Strong communication skills to articulate user flows, task flows, and design feasibility

Preferred Skills:
- Knowledge of accessibility design standards and UI performance optimization
- Exceptional storytelling and visual narrative skills to guide user interactions effectively
- Ability to push the boundaries of UI animation while maintaining performance and usability
- Familiarity with Axure, ProtoPie, or comparable mobile animation tools

Required Experience:
- 7+ years of experience in UI/Visual Design, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work in mobile and web applications
- Proven track record of designing high-fidelity UI, micro-interactions, and motion design for digital products
- Experience collaborating with cross-functional teams, including UX designers, developers, and product managers, to deliver seamless digital experiences

Preferred Experience:
- Experience in designing for accessibility and optimizing UI performance
- Familiarity with data-driven design approaches, leveraging user insights and analytics to refine visual elements
- Background in working on design systems and maintaining brand consistency across multiple digital platforms

Tools & Technologies:
- Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, LottieFiles, ProtoPie
- HTML, CSS, SVG animations
- Agile project management tools (JIRA, Confluence)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular design reviews and feedback sessions
- Agile/Scrum methodology, with a focus on iterative design and continuous improvement
- Ability to work independently and take ownership of design projects while also contributing to team-based initiatives
- Willingness to stay up-to-date with the latest design trends, technologies, and best practices
